de.mbrero.see.api

Class TestRunController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mbrero.see.api.TestRunController

  • public class TestRunController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class initializes the test run for an extraction experiment. It stores the technical and non-technical environment variables of the test run.
    Author:
    massimiliano.brero@studium.fernuni-hagen.de

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static int testRunId

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getAnnotationsFromExtractorResult()
      Configure the concept mapper to retrieve the annotations extractedfrom the input files.
      void initializeTestRun()
      Sets all needed environment parameters for a test run.
      boolean isSkipExtraction()
      Test if the parameter to skip the extraction step was set.
      void runExtractor()
      Instantiate the chosen extractor from the factory ExtractorFactory and start the test run with the given parameters.

      Save the extracted concepts to a MySQL database.
      void saveAnnotationsToTrecFile()
      Save the extracted annotations to a trec result file.

      Set the time the concept mapper took an that was measured.
      void setResult(TestRunResults result)
      Set one of the possible test result types @see TestRunResults
      void setSkipExtraction(boolean skipExtraction)
      Set if the extraction step should be skipped. use this if there was an error after a succesful extraction
      and you do not want it to run again but continue with the following steps of the execution pipeline.

      • TestRunController

        public TestRunController(java.io.File input,
                         Extractors type,
                         java.io.File outputExtractorResult,
                         java.io.File outputTRECFile,
                         java.lang.String tester,
                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Parameters:
        input - Path where the texts for the extraction process are stored.
        output - Path Path and filename for the TREC result file of the annotation process.
        tester - String Email of the person doing the extraction test.
        params - String Parameters that have to be used with the extractor call.

      • setSkipExtraction

        public void setSkipExtraction(boolean skipExtraction)
        Set if the extraction step should be skipped. use this if there was an error after a succesful extraction
        and you do not want it to run again but continue with the following steps of the execution pipeline.
        See manual for detailed information.
        Parameters:
        skipExtraction -
